EmailTemplate.subject: Grand and Toy Dedicated Account Manager (1561129381.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Kate, Just sending you this email so that you have my contact information on hand. If you require assistance let me know and I am happy to help. Have a great weekend!
Kind regards,
Michael DixonInside Account Manager 900 Belfast Rd, Ottawa ON, K1G 0Z6 | Tel: 1-800-348-2184 E. 42532 NEW! CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The content of this e-mail (and attachments, if any) is privileged and confidential, and intended solely for its designated recipient(s). Any dissemination, distribution or copying of this e-mail, other than by its intended recipient(s), is strictly prohibited. If you have received this e-mail by error, please delete it and notify us immediately by reply e-mail.
